message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with a range of features that we believe will greatly enhance your experience. Given its quality and functionality, I am offering it to you for $200. We're confident that this investment will pay off in terms of convenience and efficiency. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $175?
